title: LoL HFT #30 The Joy of Custom ARAMs

embed.description: Finally over my sickness! So late as it is, here is last week's video :) I stepped up the editing in this one a bit, so let me know what you think!

body: Let me know what you think!

replies.body: "Could you please build an item" naww what a lil cinnamon roll.
It was adorable in a "we are very handicapped here" kind of way. He took it all really well and seemed to enjoy himself so I can't complain :P It was a fab game even if we did lose in the end.
